/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the left side of the frame. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky above. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a distinctive red roof, adding a pop of color to the scene. A white car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise tranquil setting. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The overall composition of the image suggests a peaceful and serene atmosphere, typical of a sunny day in Beijing.
